snippet.title: Monster Legacy - Universal - HD Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Monster Legacy by Outplay Entertainment Ltd

BATTLE, COLLECT and EVOLVE AWESOME MONSTERS! Conquer evil and create your own legacy!
Explore treacherous dungeons and solve testing puzzles in extraordinary locations, filled with endless challenges!

Capture wild Monsters and evolve them into epic new forms! Train your Monsters to endure battle with friend and foe, and defeat the Evil Lord Ardur!

Features
- Tackle over 60 quests in more than 20 incredible locations!
- Collect and evolve countless iconic Monsters!
- Swap and share Monsters with friends!
- Explore the mythical world of Arborea in stunning HD!
- Master awesome magical attacks to become victorious!
- Customize your own Monster Island!
- Hours of gameplay and regular new content!

Network connection is required.

Rate Monster Legacy on the App Store, so we can continue making exciting features for you!

Join our community for exciting sneak peeks at new Monsters, new levels, giveaways and much more!

Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/MonsterLegacy
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/_MonsterLegacy

Experiencing problems with Monster Legacy? We're here to help: https://outplay.zendesk.com/home

Disclosures

In-App Purchases: Monster Legacy is free to download and play, but contains optional in-app purchases that cost real money. To make these purchases, you'll need to enter your Apple ID and password.

© 2013 Outplay Entertainment Ltd. Monster Legacy is a trademark of Outplay Entertainment. All rights reserved

iTunes Store Page:

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/monster-legacy/id652151375

Homepage:

https://outplay.zendesk.com/anonymous_requests/new

Facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/MonsterLegacy

Twitter:

https://twitter.com/_MonsterLegacy
